title: Garen Chroma Pack bug
body: I am not able to switch my chroma pack colors for Garen in Draft or Blind pick and when I switch them in Team Builder, they dont actually switch in game. With the Blind and Draft, it says that I am on the Noble Chroma Pack, but the color pallet selection does not show up. This issue came up a couple of patches ago and I have not been able to find a solution for it.

replies.body: The same thing is happening with me. My Drangonslayer Vayne skin doesn't loadout the chorma skin and my Cass chroma loads out the wrong chroma skin or just stays default, even though I choose the one I want to load and it displays the correct one in teambuilder, but when the match starts there's no chroma skin

Hey ImpulseNE,

Thanks for the report! This is an issue we're working to resolve. Unfortunately, we don't have a solid repro for this and are still investigating.
